```{r}
library(tidyverse)
  

library(readxl)
Data <- read_excel("Data.xlsx")

dat <- Data %>%
  select(Subject, Tid, lac.75:lac.250) %>%
  pivot_longer(names_to = "watt",
               values_to = "laktat",
               names_prefix = "lac.",
               names_transform = list(watt = as.numeric),
               cols = lac.75:lac.250) %>%
   filter(subject == 1,
         Tid == "pre",
         !is.na(laktat)) %>% # Remove NA values
  print()
  


  
```
